appDesc.message: Automagically dislike YouTube videos from certain channels.

appDescDetail.message: All this extension does is hammer the dislike button whenever you watch a video from a blacklist, or subscribed channel. No need to authenticate. Alternatively, you can automatically dislike EVERY video. Why? I dunno. Go nuts. Feel free to suggest new features or contribute:
appDescDetail.description: Detail description for the web store page

optLikeSub.message: Dislike only videos from subscribed channels

optWhiteListWarning.message: ⚠️ list is empty, nothing will be liked
